org.everit.osgi.dev.maven

Class EnvironmentConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.everit.osgi.dev.maven.EnvironmentConfiguration

  • public class EnvironmentConfiguration
extends Object
    The OSGI environment that is specified in the pom.xml for the plugin. *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<BundleSettings> bundleSettings
      Setting non-default behaviors for bundles.
      private Integer bundleStartLevel
      The default startlevel for newly installed bundles
      private String framework
      The name of the osgi framework.
      private Integer frameworkStartLevel
      The default start level of the OSGi framework.
      private String id
      The id that will be used to identify this configuration in system property of the framework.
      private int shutdownTimeout
      The amount of time in milliseconds until the plugin waits for the environment to stop after a CTRL+C was sent.
      private Map<String,String> systemProperties
      System properties that will be added to the JVM of started OSGI container.
      private int timeout
      The timeout in milliseconds after the Tests should be finished for sure.
      private List<String> vmOptions
      The JVM options that will be applied during starting the OSGI Container.

    • Field Detail

      • bundleSettings

        @Parameter
private List<BundleSettings> bundleSettings
        Setting non-default behaviors for bundles. For more information see the javadoc of BundleSettings class.

      • bundleStartLevel

        @Parameter
private Integer bundleStartLevel
        The default startlevel for newly installed bundles

      • framework

        @Parameter
private String framework
        The name of the osgi framework. Currently equinox is supported. Default is equinox.

      • frameworkStartLevel

        @Parameter
private Integer frameworkStartLevel
        The default start level of the OSGi framework.

      • id

        @Parameter
private String id
        The id that will be used to identify this configuration in system property of the framework.

      • shutdownTimeout

        @Parameter
private int shutdownTimeout
        The amount of time in milliseconds until the plugin waits for the environment to stop after a CTRL+C was sent. Default value is half a minute.

      • systemProperties

        @Parameter
private Map<String,String> systemProperties
        System properties that will be added to the JVM of started OSGI container.

      • timeout

        @Parameter
private int timeout
        The timeout in milliseconds after the Tests should be finished for sure. The environment will be stopped when this exceeds. Default value is five minutes.

      • vmOptions

        @Parameter
private List<String> vmOptions
        The JVM options that will be applied during starting the OSGI Container.
